entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as the one who was asked to take a cat out of the room. She is described as strode out of the room.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as nursing his toe and being furious at Hermione's cat.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as having a Sneakoscope and noticing Scabbers' condition.

entities.name: crookshanks
entities.description: Crookshanks is described as Hermione's cat with yellow eyes fixed maliciously on Ron.

entities.name: scabbers
entities.description: Scabbers is mentioned as being in Ron's hands and looking very skinny.

entities.name: sneakoscope
entities.description: Sneakoscope is described as a device that Harry stuffs back inside his socks.

relationships.description: Crookshanks's yellow eyes are fixed maliciously on Ron.
Harry is unpleasantly surprised to see Scabbers' condition and remembers what the woman at the Magical Menagerie said about rats living only three years.
Ron is holding Scabbers in his hands.
